divs: sighting detailsobject appeared from no where, was 1\4 size of moon and remained stationary for approximatly 3 mins. it was very low at an estimated elevation of 500 ft buts hard to say due to distance. it was in my best estimate over 3 miles away. extremely bright shifting from white light to red before blinking a very bright blue and dissappearing. am i crazy?
trends: There have been no other sightings in Damascus
This sighting has never been favorited.
